name: Breakdown of Reason

tutorials:
Battle for the Destruction of the Great Dragon
Crystal of Darkness

description: Glimpse with the White Dragon the unsettling  events that are about to unfold in the world of order
steps: Seek out the White Dragon
With the White Dragon, glimpse through the  dragon's eyes the destruction of order
Speak with Joseph
Head to Phindym with the Arisen Corps
Speak with Gearóid's envoy Musel
Gearóid awaits at Shadolean Great Temple
Rendezvous with Mordred in the Elan Water Grove
Head to the location of the Black Sword
Defeat the enemy and destroy the Black Sword
Report to Mordred
Head to Kingal Canyon and search for  the Black Sword
Defeat the enemy and destroy the Black Sword
Head towards the Hollow of Beginnings to obtain information about the new Black Sword
Head towards the Spirit Dragon's Roost and search for the Black Sword
Defeat the enemy and destroy the Black Sword
Speak with Adair Donnchadh
Head to the Shadolean Great Temple  that is being engulfed by a whirlpool
Return to Lestania and speak with the White Dragon
Speak with Joseph
Seek out Travers
Clear "The Great Dragon Crystal War: The Resisting Land" by accepting the challenge from Travers.
Report to Travers
Seek out the White Dragon
Head to the Shadolean Great Temple  where the Arisen Corps awaits
Head to the location where the dark energy within the Great Temple has shown signs of change
Defeat the encountered demons
Defeat the demons of the Vortex of Stagnation
Return to the Hollow of Beginnings
Return to Lestania and report to Joseph
